stats.title: Troop 30 compared to rest of weighly
stats.sqlQuery: SELECT COALESCE(SUM(weight), 0) AS total_combined_weight FROM weights WHERE event_id = 1;
stats.sqlTotalQuery: SELECT COALESCE(SUM(weight), 0) AS total_combined_weight FROM weights;

cards.title: Troop 30 weight over time
cards.sqlQuery: SELECT DATE(time) as date, weight FROM weights WHERE event_id = 1 ORDER BY date
